Rarity: RARE 25 DIV Cataclysm Shine Cobalt Jewel Item Level: 81 Implicits: 0 {fractured}7% increased maximum Life +12% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier +18% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Lightning Skills +14% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Elemental Skills

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
This is pretty much the strongest build I ever made.
Pros All content, fast sanctun runner, all uber bosses easily done, fast mapper Imune to all ailments, stun, corrupted blood, temporal chains, elemental weakness Can do all map mods Super fast speed Huge AoE
Cons Really tight gearing, so not so easy to change much Need to buy some tattoos
